title: How much honors i need for honor crest?

replies.body: There isn't a specific amount of honor I know of to receive a crest, but it's good to be consistent.  Information on the honor system and how to go about receiving a crest can be found in our [honor system faq](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751854-Honor-System-FAQ).  Only thing I coudl recommend is to stay positive and keep getting honor marks from your peers!  Best of luck!
